## Summary

This Shiny Web App predicts Chick Weight over Time based on Diet.

  1. Data is used for this analysis is from R dataset 'ChickWeight'
  2. This analysis does linear regression model to predict chick weight over time based on diet 
     provided by slider input.

## Data used for this analysis

Chick Weight Data is loaded from 'R' data package.

```{r}
data(ChickWeight)
dim(ChickWeight)
str(ChickWeight)
```
